content: be altered bit by bending the wires - the nug is approximately 18 cm tall ears included and 23 cm long this can vary depending on the size of the hook and yarn you use - used yarn two balls of light pink jeans/gina no 74 from yarnart - crochet hook 2 5 or 3 mm depending on how tightly you crochet - wire to make the legs keep the shape better - safety eyes 10 mm abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase decrease invisible decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch flo front loop only blo back loop only head body tail stuff the body as you crochet 1 chain 7 7 2 in the 2nd chain from the hook increase 4 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the last stitch 5 single_crochet on the other side of the chain slip_stitch in the 1st stitch this is the only one the rest of the pattern is crocheted in spiral finished 2nd row 3 8 blo single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the next stitch 5 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the last stitch 19 4 1 single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet 10 slip_stitch 21 5 increase 3 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet increase 10 slip_stitch 22 6 1 single_crochet 2 increase 6 single_crochet 2 increase 1 single_crochet 10 slip_stitch 26 7 3 single_crochet increase 8 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet 4 slip_stitch decslst 4 slip_stitch 27 * now you will make a curve of the nose which is little tricky this will not be counted as classical row lets call it row a b c k eep the marker in place be careful to recognize the stitches it can be a bit confusing especially when you will later work in the skipped stitches a chain 5 skip 4 stitches in row 7 and crochet in the 5th stitch 4sc decrease 4sc skip the rest b chain 9 skip the 1st stitch of a and crochet in the 2nd 7 single_crochet skip the last stitch of a c chain 7 skip the 1st stitch of b and crochet in the 2nd 5 single_crochet skip the last stitch of b d chain 5 skip the 1st stitch of c and crochet in the 2nd 4 single_crochet the last stitch is not skipped here now work on the side skipped stitches from previous row 3 increase 2 of them are in the last skipped stitches from b and a the 3rd one is in the following skipped stitch of row 7 continue on the rest of row 7 2 single_crochet increase 9 single_crochet you should be at the marker now the normal row continue curve of the nose from outside curve of the nose from inside finished curve of the nose 8 increase 3 single_crochet 3 increase this should be on the skipped stitches of a b c now work on the top of row d single_crochet decrease 20 single_crochet 33 9 6 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet increase 6 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet increase 6 single_crochet decrease 5 single_crochet decrease
